CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 21, 1950, pg. 15, reads: "INTRODUCTORY LUNCHEON - When Crayton's Southern Sausage Company sponsored its first in a series of Introductory Luncheons last Thursday afternoon at Loendi Club in Pittsburgh, a large number of smart socialites were present to not only enjoy the luncheon featuring a menu of the famous Crayton sausage, but also listened to an inspiring address by Palmer Boyd. Mrs. Martha Ramsey was in charge of the meeting, and Mrs. Eunice W. Cook was mistress of ceremonies. - 'Teenie' Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Audience of women, including Eunice Cook wearing light colored suit with studded lapels second from left, gathered in Loendi Club for "Introductory Luncheon" with guest speaker Palmer Boyd sponsored by Crayton's Southern Sausage Company
